select
from material a join trademark_case_pre b on a.caseId=b.id where b.custId = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.agencyId=#{agencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.precase=1

select
from material a where 1=1 and a.caseId = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.fileName=24 ORDER BY modifyTime desc

select
from material a where 1=1
and a.caseId = #{tradeMarkCaseJoinApp.caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.materialId NOT IN (SELECT materialId FROM material WHERE joinAppId = #{tradeMarkCaseJoinApp.id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) and a.subject not like '%fileName : null%'
and a.caseId = #{tradeMarkCaseJoinApp.casePreId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.materialId IN (SELECT materialId FROM material WHERE joinAppId = #{tradeMarkCaseJoinApp.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}) and a.subject not like '%fileName : null%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material ( custId, applicantId, title, SUBJECT, description, TYPE, FORMAT, STATUS, creater, createTime, MODIFIER, modifyTime, tmNumber, caseId, address, size, versionNo, docDate) SELECT custId, applicantId, title, SUBJECT, description, TYPE, FORMAT, STATUS, creater, createTime, MODIFIER, modifyTime, tmNumber, #{assoCaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address, size, versionNo, docDate FROM material WHERE caseId=#{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND joinAppId is null
mapper.select:
select
from material where caseId = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by createTime desc limit 1
